meanings.definition: Take a sample or samples of (something) for analysis or further study.
meanings.sent1: She resamples the soil to check for any changes over time.
meanings.sent2: The scientist resamples the water to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent3: The chef resamples the soup to make sure it's seasoned just right.
meanings.sent4: The artist resamples the colors to create a harmonious palette.
meanings.sent5: He resamples the music to enhance the sound quality.

meanings.definition: A new sample taken from the same population as a previous sample.
meanings.sent1: The resamples of the data showed consistent results.
meanings.sent2: She compared the resamples to identify any patterns.
meanings.sent3: The resamples of the fabric were used for quality control.
meanings.sent4: The resamples of the paint helped in color matching.
meanings.sent5: He collected resamples to ensure the accuracy of the study.
